sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SETTING, in nautical language. To set the land or the sun by the compass, is to observe how the land bears on any point of the compass, or on what point of the compass the sun is ; also, when two ships sail in sight of each other, to mark on what point the chased bears, is termed setting the chase by the compass.
